Q_DESC:
Antonio is a software engineer. He got a proposal from a company that is transforming all its man work into digital means. Antonio was asked to develop a C program using functions to print the payslip of all the employees of the company. The software should do all validations of the input data. 
Input:   The first line contains the name of the employee.
      The second line contains the basic pay, which is a positive number (probably float). 
     The third line consists of the hra, a positive number
Output :  payslip in the given format as in the test cases
